price: Deε yɛayi akyerε me ara ne sε, meyε kͻkͻbͻni pefee.
arabic: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: in yūḥā ilayya illā annamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
